questions.quote: Would you hold it a second?! Thank you, will you get out of here with that stuff?
I've had a crush on this woman for year! I've always been afraid to approach her! She looks like she belongs on one of these Hallmark cards.
"About tonight hum.. there's been a little misunderstanding."
Well, I can see that. What do you have to do that for? Who cares about your pants size?
So, what am I looking at here? Twenty-nine hours to go. Well, at least I got plenty of time to find out the name of that perfume...
Well, it's too late. I gave it to Elaine, and she's already on her way to give it to George's father.
She lives right off Riverside Park. I was scared of the Lopper, So I let her stay over.
No no you know we're not partners. I only get twenty-five percent.
Yeah, I see what you mean. I forgot who I was dealing with here.
Why would I do it unless I was in mortal danger? I know it's against the law.
